attributes.action: Propose a windfall tax on Glaxo-Smithkline for profiteering on the sale of swine-flu medication to the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Each dose of flu vaccine has been reported to cost Glaxo-Smithkline £1 to produce, yet for each dose they are charging the public sector £6.  This should be investigated by the National Audit Office and recommendations should be made to investigate profiteering from a public health crisis.
